mapper.sql: wdl.dol_id, wdl.doh_id, wdl.spd_id, wdl.sp_id, wdl.so_id, wdl.sod_id, wdl.product_id, wdl.product_barcode, wdl.spec_type, wdl.media_id, wdl.product_no, wdl.product_name, wdl.product_name_local, wdl.product_upc_code, wdl.brand, wdl.stock_unit, wdl.unit_gross_weight, wdl.unit_vol, wdl.qty, wdl.weight, wdl.vol, wdl.big_bag_qty, wdl.big_bag_rate, wdl.mid_bag_qty, wdl.mid_bag_rate, wdl.small_bag_qty, wdl.ship_qty, wdl.ship_weight, wdl.ship_vol, wdl.memo, wdl.cost_reference, wdl.unit_price, wdl.amount
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wms_do_line wdl WHERE wrl.doh_id = #{dohId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY wrl.dol_id DESC
